testcase.name: Column verification of Homepage
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the PwC Digital Pulse website...........................passed When I am viewing the "Home" page...........................................passed Then I am presented with "3" columns of articles............................passed And The "left" column is displaying "2" articles............................passed And The "middle" column is displaying "1" articles..........................passed And The "right" column is displaying "4" articles...........................passed

testcase.name: Subscription fields validations
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the PwC Digital Pulse website...........................passed When I am viewing the "Home" page...........................................passed When I click on the Subscribe navigation link...............................passed Then I am taken to the Subscribe page.......................................passed And I am presented with the below fields....................................passed And I will need to complete Google reCAPTCHA before I can complete my request.passed

testcase.name: Search Result verification
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to the PwC Digital Pulse website...........................passed When I click on the Magnifying glass icon to perform a search...............passed And I enter the text "Single page applications".............................passed And I submit the search.....................................................passed Then I am taken to the search results page..................................passed And I am presented with at least "1" search result..........................passed
